password.Description: Password for the SDWAN vManage server

proxy_creds.Description: Proxy Server Credentials in the form of username:password

proxy_url.Description: Proxy Server URL with port number

url.Description: URL for the SDWAN vManage server

username.Description: Username for the SDWAN vManage server

created_on.Description: Time when  Device Template is created

device_type.Description: Type of device for which Device Template should be created

factory_default.Description: Boolean flag indicating whether Device Template is factory default or not

general_templates.Description: List of Feature Templates and thier Sub Templates thourgh which Device Template is created

sub_templates.Description: List of Sub Templates associated with feature Template

sub_template_id.Description: Sub Template Id of Feature Template

sub_template_type.Description: Sub Template Type of Feature Template

last_updated_by.Description: User who updated  Device Template last

last_updated_on.Description: Time when Device Template last updated

template_attached.Description: Number of templates attached to Device Template

template_class.Description: Template Class type for  Device Template

template_id.Description: Device Template id for  Device Template
